summary: An ambitious but strict father, who once dreamed of being a boxer, persuades his two weak-willed sons to start careers in boxing.
cast: Sulevi Peltola|Mikko Alanko|Petteri Summanen|Antti Litja|Rea Mauranen|Jaana Järvinen|Maria Järvenhelmi|Jussi Lampi|Annaleena Sipilä|Rauno Ahonen|Taneli Mäkelä|Riitta Elstelä|Erkki Luja|Mikko Vanhala|Juho Kainulainen|Rile Norberg|Pentti Halonen|Juha Varis|Henna Hakkarainen|Tommi Korpela|Esa Suvilehto|Olli Pellikka|Sampo Marttila|Meri Nenonen
title: Haaveiden kehä
